Test Case Title: Verify user registration with valid data
Description: Test that a new user can register successfully with valid information
Preconditions: No existing user with same email
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /api/v1/auth/register
2. Send POST request with valid registration data
3. Verify response status and data
Expected Result:
Status: 201 Created
Response contains userId, email, accessToken, refreshToken, roles

Test Case Title: Verify registration fails with duplicate email
Description: Test that registration fails when email already exists
Test Steps:
1. Register a user with email X
2. Try to register another user with same email X
3. Verify error response
Expected Result:
Status: 409 Conflict
Error message: Email already exists

Test Case Title: Verify registration fails with weak password
Test Steps:
1. Send registration request with weak password
2. Verify validation error
Expected Result:
Status: 422 Unprocessable Entity
Validation errors for password requirements

Test Case Title: Verify registration fails with mismatched passwords
Test Steps:
1. Send registration request where password != confirmPassword
2. Verify validation error
Expected Result:
Status: 422 Unprocessable Entity
Error: Passwords do not match

Test Steps:
1. Send POST to /api/v1/auth/login with valid credentials
2. Verify response contains tokens
Expected Result:
Status: 200 OK
Response contains accessToken, refreshToken, userId, roles

Test Case Title: Verify login fails with invalid email
Test Steps:
1. Send login request with non-existent email
2. Verify error response
Expected Result:
Status: 400 Bad Request
Error: Invalid credentials

Test Case Title: Verify login fails with wrong password
Test Steps:
1. Send login request with wrong password
2. Verify error response
Expected Result:
Status: 400 Bad Request
Error: Invalid credentials

Description: Test refresh token generates new access token
Preconditions: User is logged in with valid refresh token
Test Steps:
1. Send POST to /api/v1/auth/refresh with valid refresh token
2. Verify new tokens returned
Expected Result:
Status: 200 OK
Response contains new accessToken and refreshToken

Test Steps:
1. Send POST to /api/v1/auth/logout with valid token
2. Verify success response
3. Try to use old token - should fail
Expected Result:
Status: 200 OK
Subsequent requests with old token should fail

Test Steps:
1. Send GET to /api/v1/auth/me with valid token
2. Verify user details returned
Expected Result:
Status: 200 OK
Response contains userId, email, firstName, lastName, roles

Test Case Title: Verify change password with valid data
Test Steps:
1. Send POST to /api/v1/auth/change-password
2. Verify success
3. Login with new password works
Expected Result:
Status: 200 OK
User can login with new password

Test Case Title: Verify change password fails with wrong current password
Test Steps:
1. Send change-password with incorrect current password
2. Verify error
Expected Result:
Status: 400 Bad Request
Error: Current password is incorrect

Description: Test admin can retrieve paginated user list
Test Steps:
1. Send GET to /api/v1/users?page=1&pageSize=10
2. Verify paginated response
Expected Result: Status: 200 OK with paginated user list including totalCount

Test Case Title: Verify get all users unauthorized for Employee
Description: Test employee cannot access all users
Test Steps:
1. Send GET to /api/v1/users with Employee token
2. Verify forbidden response
Expected Result: Status: 403 Forbidden

Test Steps:
1. Send GET to /api/v1/users/{userId}
2. Verify user details returned
Expected Result:
Status: 200 OK
Response contains user details with roles

Test Case Title: Verify get user by ID - not found
Test Steps:
1. Send GET to /api/v1/users/{invalidId}
2. Verify not found response
Expected Result:
Status: 404 Not Found
Error: User not found

Description: Test admin can create new users
Test Steps:
1. Send POST to /api/v1/users with user data
2. Verify user created
Expected Result:
Status: 201 Created
User created with assigned roles

Test Case Title: Verify create user fails with duplicate email
Test Steps:
1. Send POST to create user with existing email
2. Verify conflict response
Expected Result:
Status: 409 Conflict
Error: User with email already exists

Test Steps:
1. Send PUT to /api/v1/users/{userId} with updated data
2. Verify update successful
Expected Result:
Status: 200 OK
User details updated

Test Steps:
1. Send PATCH to /api/v1/users/{userId}/deactivate
2. Verify user deactivated
Expected Result:
Status: 200 OK
User is now inactive

Test Case Title: Verify cannot deactivate user with pending redemptions
Test Steps:
1. Try to deactivate user with pending redemptions
2. Verify error
Expected Result:
Status: 400 Bad Request
Error: Cannot deactivate user with pending redemptions

Test Steps:
1. Try to deactivate the only admin user
2. Verify error
Expected Result:
Status: 400 Bad Request
Error: Cannot deactivate last admin

Test Steps:
1. Send GET to /api/v1/events
2. Verify returns Upcoming/Active/Completed events (not Draft)
Expected Result:
Status: 200 OK
Returns events excluding Draft status

Test Steps:
1. Send GET to /api/v1/events/{eventId}
2. Verify event details returned
Expected Result:
Status: 200 OK
Response contains event details

Description: Test admin can create new events
Test Steps:
1. Send POST to /api/v1/events with event data
2. Verify event created in Draft status
Expected Result:
Status: 201 Created
Event created with Draft status

Test Case Title: Verify create event unauthorized for Employee
Test Steps:
1. Send POST to /api/v1/events with Employee token
2. Verify forbidden

Description: Test admin can update event details

1. Send PUT to /api/v1/events/{eventId} with updated data

Test Steps:

2. Verify event cancelled

Test Case Title: Verify change event status: Draft to Upcoming
Test Steps:
1. Send PATCH to /api/v1/events/{eventId}/status
2. Verify status changed
Expected Result:
Status: 200 OK
Event status is now Upcoming

Test Case Title: Verify change event status: Upcoming to Active
Test Steps:
1. Send PATCH to /api/v1/events/{eventId}/status
2. Verify status changed
Expected Result:
Status: 200 OK
Event status is now Active

Test Case Title: Verify change event status: Active to Completed
Test Steps:
1. Send PATCH to /api/v1/events/{eventId}/status
2. Verify status changed
Expected Result:
Status: 200 OK
Event status is now Completed

Test Case Title: Verify invalid status transition is rejected
Test Steps:
1. Try to change status from Draft directly to Completed
2. Verify error
Expected Result:
Status: 400 Bad Request
Error: Invalid status transition

Test Steps:
1. Send GET to /api/v1/events/{eventId}/participants
2. Verify participants list
Expected Result:
Status: 200 OK
Returns list of participants

Test Steps:
1. Send POST to /api/v1/events/{eventId}/participants
2. Verify registration successful
Expected Result:
Status: 200 OK
Participant registered

Test Case Title: Verify registration fails when max participants reached
Preconditions: Event is Upcoming, max participants reached
Test Steps:
1. Try to register when event is full
2. Verify error
Expected Result:
Status: 400 Bad Request
Error: Event has reached maximum participants

Test Case Title: Verify award points to event winners
Description: Test awarding points after event completion

2. Verify points added to user accounts

Status: 200 OK
Points awarded to winners, transactions created

Status: 200 OK
Paginated transaction list with totalCount

Test Case Title: Verify password is hashed in database
Test Steps:
1. Check database for user password
2. Verify it's hashed not plaintext
Expected Result: Password is stored as hash, not plaintext

Test Steps:
1. Send malicious SQL in input fields
2. Verify no SQL injection
Expected Result: Request is rejected or safely handled

Test Steps:
1. Submit XSS payload in text fields
2. Verify not executed
Expected Result: Script is escaped/encoded, not executed

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /login
2. Verify form fields and buttons visible
Expected Result: Login form with email, password fields and login button

Test Case Title: Verify successful login redirects to dashboard
Test Steps:
1. Enter valid credentials
2. Click Login
3. Verify redirect
Expected Result: Redirected to dashboard page

Test Steps:
1. Click Login with empty fields
2. Verify validation messages
Expected Result: Validation errors displayed

Test Steps:

2. Verify KPI cards visible
Expected Result: Dashboard shows total users, events, points stats

Test Steps:

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to Events page
2. Verify events list loads
Expected Result: Events displayed in list/grid format

2. Confirm registration

2. Verify products grid loads
Expected Result: Products displayed with images, names, points cost

Test Steps:
1. Select a category filter
2. Verify products filtered
Expected Result: Only products from selected category shown

Preconditions: Employee logged in, has points, product available
Test Steps:

4. Verify success
Expected Result: Redemption created successfully message

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to Products management
2. Click Add Product
3. Fill form and submit
4. Verify product created
Expected Result: Product appears in list

Preconditions: Admin logged in & pending redemptions exist
Test Steps:

2. Find pending redemption

4. Verify status changed
Expected Result: Redemption status changed to Approved

2. Click Add User
3. Fill form and submit
4. Verify user created
Expected Result: User appears in list

Test Steps:
1. Click each menu item
2. Verify correct page loads
Expected Result: Each menu navigates to correct page

Test Steps:
1. Open app on mobile screen size
2. Verify layout adapts
3. Test navigation menu
Expected Result: UI is responsive, navigation usable

Test Case Title: Verify complete registration to points account flow
Test Steps:
1. Register new user
2. Verify points account created with 0 balance
Expected Result: User created with points account (balance: 0)

Test Steps:
1. Complete event
2. Award points to winner
3. Verify points in user account
Expected Result: Points reflected in user's account balance

Test Case Title: Verify redemption deducts points and reduces stock
Preconditions: User has points, product in stock
Test Steps:
1. Create redemption
2. Verify points deducted
3. Verify stock reduced (reserved)
Expected Result: Points deducted, stock reserved

Test Steps:
1. Reject redemption
2. Verify points refunded to user
3. Verify stock restored
Expected Result: Points refunded, stock available again

Test Steps:
1. Try to deactivate user with pending redemptions
2. Verify prevented
Expected Result: Deactivation blocked until redemptions resolved

Test Case Title: Verify API response time under load
Test Steps:
1. Send 100 concurrent requests
2. Measure response times
Expected Result: 95% of responses under 500ms

Test Steps:
1. Request paginated data
2. Verify response time acceptable
Expected Result: Response time under 1 second

Test Steps:
1. Try to delete parent with children
2. Verify constraint prevents deletion
Expected Result: Delete blocked or cascades properly

Test Steps:
1. Execute SP_GetTop3EmployeesByRewards
2. Verify returns top 3 correctly
Expected Result: Returns exactly 3 top point earners
